title: Authorizes franchise tax credit for providers of child care services in certain instances
summary: Authorizes franchise tax credit for providers of child care services in certain instances; gives employers 30% tax credit on investments to offer child care services or to purchase child care resource referral services; provides that the amount of credit shall be the lesser of $500 or the amounts of credits imposed by õ601 of the tax law for the taxable year, reduced by the credits permitted under õ620 (credit for income tax of another state) and õ621 (credit to trust beneficiary receiving accumulation distribution), multiplied by a fraction (numerator is net income derived from business attributable to the provision of home day care services and the denominator is NYS adjusted gross income).

   14  AND REFERRAL PROGRAMS.
